definition: to look face to face
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to look at/to regard/to inspect

sentences.english: Sink to eradicate to peruse with gentleman tiny trembled to quiver towards seeing one eye all bad coldly.
sentences.chinese: 沉消和君阅微对视一眼都恶寒的抖了抖。

sentences.english: I copy to understand and think that the concealed weapon stops towards seeing one eye, with month unless stop to fight.
sentences.chinese: 我和月影对视一眼，明白要想暗器停止除非暂停打斗。

sentences.english: With brief eye contact and slight smile, I felt incomparably happy right at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 简短的对视和轻轻微笑，一霎那，我幸福无比。

sentences.english: I sit for just a second and stare at her, but she doesn’t return the look.
sentences.chinese: 我坐了几秒钟，怔怔看着她，但是她不跟我对视。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of the field-dependent cognitive style on optokinetic illusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨场依存性认知方式对视动性错觉的影响。

sentences.english: You can look at your fear and send it the energy of deliverance.
sentences.chinese: 你能对视你的害怕并送去解脱的能量。

sentences.english: He rudely stared down my friend in the corner of the street.
sentences.chinese: 在街角他把我的朋友盯得不敢与他对视。

sentences.english: Grandpa looked at Grandma, and they both looked at Margie.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷和奶奶对视了一下，一起看着玛姬。

sentences.english: I was sitting at the front of the plane and made eye contact with the flight attendant.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在飞机前部，和空服员对视了一下。

sentences.english: When I was fat, I avoided meeting people’s eyes.
sentences.chinese: 当我很胖时，我尽量避免与人对视。

sentences.english: Husband and wife looked at each other again.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫与妻子又互相对视了一下。

sentences.english: Silence caressed their faces, softly as both boys loked at each other across the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 寂静弥漫在他们身边，两个男孩越过黑暗对视着。

sentences.english: The two men looked at each other for a long moment.
sentences.chinese: 两人沉默对视了一会儿。

sentences.english: Small and weak as I was, I stared firmly back at him.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我又弱又小，我却坚定地和他对视着。

sentences.english: They looked at each other, the old man still beaming.
sentences.chinese: 两人对视着，老人仍然笑眯眯的。
